# gitea_team_membership (Data Source)

Use this data source to verify that a user is a member of a specific team. If the user is not a member of the team, the data source will return an error.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org` (String) The name of the organization that owns the team.
- `team_name` (String) The name of the team to check membership for.
- `username` (String) The username of the user to verify membership for.

### Read-Only

- `team_id` (Number) The numeric ID of the team.
